    • createAccount

      public void createAccount(String name, String password) throws Exception
      Parameters:
      name -
      password -
      Throws:
      Exception - if the account already exists
      Exception - if the account creation fails
      Exception - if name or password is not long enough (min 4 characters) creates a new account with the given name and password, if successful, it saves to file
